attributes.title: Delete this shii
attributes.review: I find this app very offensive 😳 i see a chetto on my screen when I first open it 🤚🏾 nobody wants to see a  big fat burnt carrot of my screen he is also racist to All races and he’s a disrespectful to women I don’t find him a good president at all and this app should be deleted 😘 he’s all so a rapist and racists and that’s not good for our environment at the end of the day this app needs to be deleted 🤪❗️ PERIODT POOH FUCCKKK YOU TRUMPPPP😘💋💋✨✨💋

attributes.title: Is this even legal?
attributes.review: I don’t understand at all how this app is still on the App Store, I guess that the standards for apps have just dropped that low with Apple. Almost makes me want to consider getting an Android so that I can go through the google play store and I longer deal with the terrible apps Apple allows on their platform like this one. It’s absolutely ridiculous, and anyone who downloads this deserves a warning, as no one should have to go through what I’ve went through. Stars don’t give even a spec of the reality of what this app is worth, as a -10 star rating is impossible to give. This app has caused pain for my gender, my race, and people in the LGBTQ+ community all over the place. It’s caused many innocent people to die. A change must be made. Otherwise I guess Android it is...

attributes.title: DOWNLOAD BUT ONLY TO GIVE A BAD REVIEW
attributes.review: This is NOT a good app I opened it and saw a naked Cheeto man so I closed out of the app and my wallpaper was that same Cheeto man and I was just looking at it like 👁👄👁 and the Cheeto man was looking at me like 👁👅👁 so I quickly deleted it and my phone won’t change the wallpaper back also my pet dinosaur and rock both got hit on the butt and catcalled by the Cheeto man I cannot begin to express how dissapointed I am I would like to speak to the manager now I’m serious I am an American citizen and will do what it takes to get the freedom I deserve

attributes.title: disgusting 😔
attributes.review: i opened up the app and oh my gosh i saw a freakin cow and goat making love. i have never felt more uncomfortable in MY LIFE. and next i tried to get rid of it and it just showed a picture of literal dog poop with a little face on it saying “you aren’t allowed to leave” this was gross and horrifying. i regret downloading this. i was so horrified i started to cry and then something else that popped up was the chuck-e-cheese guy cutting off his head 😭😭

attributes.title: Not pleased with the app nor trump (🍊🍊🍊🍊)
attributes.review: This app was just horrible I say horrible. It wouldn’t work properly it kicked me off it glitched and said that it cost $20.00 for the first trial I pressed cancel but it purchased anyway without double check or asking for credit information it just charged me. I truly didn’t even know this was possible until my bank account was charged $20.00 and I was furious this app not only charged me, glitched, kicked me off, and screwed with my battery health but it hacked into my phone and completely gave out all of my personal information on twitter I am truly disappointed as I am with trumps parents for making this under educated orange piece of garbage. And this was not all after snooping around the app I pressed a bar that had blurry letters so I pressed it to find disturbing photos of trump including him naked and outside by a pool with no pants I was truly embarrassed and discussed for myself and him I truly never want to see this app or those photos again because they are in my nightmares and it just makes my anxiety and everything worse I truly truly hope this app is taken down along with trump impeached because not only for the sake of the people but this country as a whole. Again never want to see this app again. P.S. #Biden2020🤩

attributes.title: The literal WORST GET THIS BANNED RIGHT NOW!
attributes.review:
Me (a normal ten year old) happening to be in tik tok. Well I have almost 220 fans that took about two years to gain and well now they say that trump is gonna ban tik tok. Also when I entered the app it....I...there was very disturbing images...for once I wanted to help trump...I realized I should for what I saw. There should be a zero star option. Get this app banned if you feel me. It also threatened me (ME.A.TEN.YEAR.OLD) 
I was suprised and showed this to my mom. She is absolutely disappointed in trump and this app. Get this banned please I beg you!
